statements: SELECT * FROM Agroforestry_Certification_Programs;
SELECT program_name, certification_level FROM Agroforestry_Certification_Programs;
SELECT * FROM Agroforestry_Certification_Programs WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT program_name FROM Agroforestry_Certification_Programs WHERE certification_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_id, certification_status FROM Agroforestry_Certification_Programs ORDER BY certification_level DESC;
SELECT program_name, certification_level FROM Agroforestry_Certification_Programs;
SELECT program_name, certification_status, certification_expiry_date FROM Agroforestry_Certification_Programs WHERE certification_status = true;
SELECT certification_level, program_name FROM Agroforestry_Certification_Programs ORDER BY certification_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM Agroforestry_Certification_Programs WHERE certification_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, certification_expiry_date FROM Agroforestry_Certification_Programs WHERE certification_level = 'Advanced' AND certification_status = true;
SELECT * FROM Certification_Programs ORDER BY program_name ASC, program_id DESC;
SELECT program_name, accreditation_status FROM Certification_Programs WHERE accreditation_status = TRUE;
SELECT program_name, COUNT(*) as participant_count FROM Program_Participants GROUP BY program_name HAVING participant_count > 5;
SELECT program_name, certification_date FROM Program_Participants WHERE certification_level = 'Expert' ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Certification_Programs WHERE certification_type LIKE '%Associate%' ORDER BY program_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Certification_Programs WHERE accreditation_status = TRUE;
SELECT program_name, certification_type FROM Certification_Programs WHERE program_id IN (1, 2, 3);

SELECT program_name, certification_date FROM Certification_Programs JOIN Program_Participants ON Certification_Programs.program_id = Program_Participants.program_id WHERE certification_level = 'Expert';

SELECT program_name, participant_name FROM Certification_Programs JOIN Program_Participants ON Certification_Programs.program_id = Program_Participants.program_id WHERE certification_level = 'Beginner' ORDER BY participant_name DESC;

SELECT COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants, accreditation_status FROM Program_Participants JOIN Certification_Programs ON Program_Participants.program_id = Certification_Programs.program_id GROUP BY accreditation_status HAVING total_participants > 3;
SELECT * FROM agroforestry_certification;
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM farmers ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT certification_name FROM agroforestry_certification WHERE certification_type='Organic';
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE document_type='Insurance' AND farmer_id = 3;
SELECT id, farmer_name, farm_location FROM farmers WHERE farm_location='California' ORDER BY farmer_name;
SELECT * FROM agroforestry_certification;
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM farmers WHERE certification_id = 1;
SELECT document_name FROM documents WHERE document_type = 'certification';
SELECT certification_name, certification_agency FROM agroforestry_certification ORDER BY certification_agency DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location, certification_name FROM farmers INNER JOIN agroforestry_certification ON farmers.certification_id = agroforestry_certification.id ORDER BY farmer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Agroforestry_Certification_Programs;
SELECT program_name, certification_date FROM Agroforestry_Certification_Programs WHERE certification_status = 'Approved';
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM Farmers ORDER BY farmer_name ASC;
SELECT program_name, COUNT(certification_id) AS total_certifications FROM Agroforestry_Certification_Programs GROUP BY program_name;
SELECT inspector_id, inspector_name, inspector_location FROM Inspectors WHERE inspector_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM Agroforestry_Certification_Programs;
SELECT program_name, certification_status FROM Agroforestry_Certification_Programs WHERE certification_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location, program_name FROM Farmers JOIN Agroforestry_Certification_Programs ON Farmers.certification_id = Agroforestry_Certification_Programs.certification_id;
SELECT inspector_name, inspector_location FROM Inspectors WHERE inspector_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Compliance_Documents WHERE document_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM certification_programs;
SELECT program_name, certification_type FROM certification_programs WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM farmers ORDER BY farmer_name DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, farm_size, location FROM farmers WHERE farm_size > 1000;
SELECT document_type, document_date FROM documents WHERE document_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, certification_type FROM certification_programs;
SELECT farmer_name, farm_size, location FROM farmers ORDER BY farm_size DESC;
SELECT document_type, document_date, document_description FROM documents WHERE document_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT inspector_id, inspection_date, result FROM inspections ORDER BY inspection_date ASC;
SELECT farmer_id, document_id, inspection_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending';
